title: File Upload + MySql Does Not Work
body:
Replace<form onSubmit="return validateForm()" action="offer_save.php" method="post" class="form-horizontal form-label-left input_mask">

With <form onSubmit="return validateForm()" action="offer_save.php" method="post" class="form-horizontal form-label-left input_mask" enctype="multipart/form-data" >

And sanitize the user input by escaping strings using 

mysqli_real_escape_string($vairable)
